nodes.text: Mother was the title given to a leader in various cultures. Seven years before the Clone Wars, Mother Pran was the leader of the Open, a faction of humans that lived on the planet Carnelion IV. During the Clone Wars, Talzin held the title of Mother and served as the spiritual guide of the Nightsisters of Dathomir. Prior to their near-destruction, Mother Talzin was sought out by the Nightsisters for advice. As Mother, and the most powerful witch in the order, Talzin handled all interactions with the outside galaxy. The Mustafarian priestess, Sssl of Clan Rrrt held the title.
